name: enprovia
overview:
enproviaÂ® innovates in document management enterprise technology and provides professional services covering the complete project lifecycle. We help our customers to manage and control corporate processes and document workflows and our solutions can be found in international corporations around the world.

One of our main business areas is to provide mobile integration technology for our solution partners, where our mobile enabler(TM) helps shorten the time to market and reduce integration pain when existing business back-end systems shall be accessed through mobile devices.

We further provide solutions for integration of Enterprise Content Management and Document Management Systems, where our solution supports most common ECM and DMS products, adding functionality such as federated search across multiple backends and direct web access, as well as coming with rich clients for both Mac OS X and MS Windows.

Our mobile e-forms solution work across various mobile devices and can be used to speed up roll out of projects in e.g. market intelligence scenarios, medical health record systems and maintenance & repair operations.
